st:Description.name: DNBGanttSettings
st:Description.st:role: Settings to handle the Gantt Chart Window Parameters

st:attribute.Name: DisplayBase
st:attribute.st:role: Sets the base for displaying the Time Bars for Leaf Nodes in the Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets the base for displaying the Time Bars for Leaf Nodes.It can be based either on Specified Cycle Time or Calculated Cycle Time

st:attribute.Name: Reference
st:attribute.st:role: Sets the base for displaying the Time Bars for Leaf Nodes
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets the base for displaying the Time Bars for Parent Nodes.It can be based either on Specified Cycle Time or Calculated Cycle Time or\nthe user can even choose not to display the Time Bars for the Parent nodes by selecting the None option

st:attribute.Name: SortOrderMode
st:attribute.st:role: Sets the Sort order for the Gantt Rows
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets the Sort order for the Gantt Rows while opening the Gantt Chart. The Rows can be sorted based on the PPR tree or based on the Begin Times or based on Logical Grouping of the activities

st:attribute.Name: SpecifiedTimeBarColor
st:attribute.st:role: Sets the color of the Specified Cycle Time Bars
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets the color of the Time Bars which are based on Specified Cycle Time

st:attribute.Name: TextAlignment
st:attribute.st:role: Sets the Alignment of the text within the Cells in the Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets the Alignment of the text within the Cells in the Gantt Chart

st:attribute.Name: CalculatedTimeBarColor
st:attribute.st:role: Sets the color of the Calculated Cycle Time Bars
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets the color of the Time Bars which are based on Calculated Cycle Time

st:attribute.Name: StackedDisplayMode
st:attribute.st:role: Gives a Stacked Display of the Time Bars in Resource Gantt
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Gives a Stacked Display of the Time Bars in Resource Gantt

st:attribute.Name: MaxCycleGrid
st:attribute.st:role: Sets the Step size of the the Cycle Time Bar
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets the Step size for moving the Cycle Time Bar

st:attribute.Name: LogicalActivitiesMode
st:attribute.st:role: Displays Logical Activities in Gantt
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays Logical Activities in Gantt

st:attribute.Name: CyclesMode
st:attribute.st:role: Displays Cycle Time Bars in Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays Cycle Time Bars in Gantt Chart

st:attribute.Name: ControlFlowMode
st:attribute.st:role: Displays Control Flows in the Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays Control Flows in the Gantt Chart

st:attribute.Name: PrecedenceFlowMode
st:attribute.st:role: Displays Precedence Constraints in the Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays Precedence Constraints in the Gantt Chart

st:attribute.Name: PrevCycleFlowMode
st:attribute.st:role: Displays Previous Cycle Constraints in the Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays Previous Cycle Constraints in the Gantt Chart

st:attribute.Name: SyncFlowMode
st:attribute.st:role: Displays Start-Start/End-End Synchronization Constraints in the Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays Start-Start/End-End Synchronization Constraints in the Gantt Chart

st:attribute.Name: PrecActMode
st:attribute.st:role: Displays Preceding Activity Constraints in the Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays Preceding Activity Constraints in the Gantt Chart

st:attribute.Name: ShiftActivitiesMode
st:attribute.st:role: Shift Activities to the Latest Start Time
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Shift Activities to the Latest Start Time

st:attribute.Name: XMLViewerEnabled
st:attribute.st:role: Enables an external application to view the XML file generated from the Export to XML command
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Enables dumping the Gantt Table into an XML

st:attribute.Name: XMLViewerLocation
st:attribute.st:role: Location of the application to view the exported XML of the Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Location of the application to view the exported XML of the Gantt Chart

st:attribute.Name: ScaleZoom
st:attribute.st:role: Gantt Zoom scale
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Gantt Zoom scale

st:attribute.Name: ScaleMultiplier
st:attribute.st:role: Gantt Scale Mutliplier
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Gantt Scale Mutliplier

st:attribute.Name: ScaleUnitSymbol
st:attribute.st:role: Unit Symbol for Gantt Scale
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Unit Symbol for Gantt Scale

st:attribute.Name: ColumnWidths
st:attribute.st:role: Gantt Column Widths
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Gantt Column Widths

st:attribute.Name: ColumnSortOrder
st:attribute.st:role: Sort order of the Gantt Columns
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sort order of the Gantt Columns

st:attribute.Name: ColumnShow
st:attribute.st:role: Column Hide show status

st:attribute.Name: SummaryBarInRed
st:attribute.st:role: Sets the color of the Summary Bar when the Roll-up time EQUALS Displayed Time
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets the color of the Summary Bar when the Roll-up time EQUALS Displayed Time

st:attribute.Name: NewColumnAtts
st:attribute.st:role: New column attrributes
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: New column attrributes

st:attribute.Name: ColumnNamesSize
st:attribute.st:role: Sort order of the Gantt Columns
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sort order of the Gantt Columns

st:attribute.Name: ColumnNames
st:attribute.st:role: Sort order of the Gantt Columns
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sort order of the Gantt Columns

st:attribute.Name: SavedQueryListSize
st:attribute.st:role: Sort order of the Gantt Columns
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sort order of the Gantt Columns

st:attribute.Name: SavedQueryList
st:attribute.st:role: Sort order of the Gantt Columns
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sort order of the Gantt Columns

st:attribute.Name: GanttZoom
st:attribute.st:role: Displays Previous Cycle Constraints in the Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays Previous Cycle Constraints in the Gantt Chart

st:attribute.Name: GanttSplitterPosition
st:attribute.st:role: Displays Previous Cycle Constraints in the Gantt Chart
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays Previous Cycle Constraints in the Gantt Chart

st:attribute.Name: HoldFullSolve
st:attribute.st:role: Holds the status of the solver
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Holds the status of the solver

st:attribute.Name: MixedModeInUse
st:attribute.st:role: Attribute to get the status of an option which is no longer used. In case of previous CATSetting versions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Attribute to get the status of an option which is no longer used. In case of previous CATSetting versions

st:attribute.Name: MixedMode
st:attribute.st:role: Attribute for a previously used option
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Attribute for a previously used option

st:attribute.Name: ProductFlowMode
st:attribute.st:role: Option to determine if the Product Flow is to be considered
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: This option determines if the Product Flow is to be considered. The Product flow is considered if checked on and not considered otherwise
